author: vmassol
msg: Prevent containers that add a charset to the content type from failing the testSetContentType test. This is valid (see RFC 2616, section 3.4.1). Note that Tomcat 5.0.14 is the first container I've seen that has this behavior.

author: vmassol
msg: Revert previous commit which was done by error. We're not yet ready to add Resin 3.x...

author: vmassol
msg: Updated to newest versions of Tomcat 4.x and 5.x. There is one test in error with Tomcat 5.0.14.
